data.eml:eml: Catalogue of distribution of lizards (Reptilia: Squamata) from the Brazilian Amazonia. III. Anguidae, Scincidae, Teiidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ribeiro-Júnior, Marco A., Amaral, Silvana (2016): Catalogue of distribution of lizards (Reptilia: Squamata) from the Brazilian Amazonia. III. Anguidae, Scincidae, Teiidae. Zootaxa 4205 (5): 401-430, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.5.1
